html:
12.24.23  5:08 am   Hey bill I just wanted to ask why is everything nothing and nothing everything 

      maybe it's because 0 and infinity are so equally uncomprehensible to us, so they seem to resemble each other

12.24.23  2:54 am   should i practise fast or slow?

      both, but also at a medium speed

12.24.23  2:42 am   youre so cool. something about your songs always seems to give me hope for the future. anyways, would you consider "christmas isnt real" to be a christmas song

      pretty much

12.24.23  2:41 am   Hi bill do you think you're you because you're creative, or creative because you are you

      i'm not sure

12.24.23  2:26 am   How does one attempt to be creative when the perceived energy required is higher than the value gained from doing the creative thing?

      in that case maybe don't. there's plenty of other cases where the cost/result balance is much much more favorable

12.24.23  2:23 am   WHY DOES IT WHEN READING A CAPS LOCKED SEEMS SO CHAOTIC AND IT FEELS THAT IM YELLING AND ANGRY BUT IN FACT I AM NOT?

      because it's been used so much by other people for that purpose. just like the word 'sandwich', it's been used to refer to sandwiches so many times before, now it makes you think of a sandwich whenever the word sandwich is used

12.24.23  2:21 am   Why do Humans give up efficiency for aesthetic?

      maybe at that moment they felt they already had sufficient efficiency, but not enough aesthetic

12.24.23  2:21 am   are you secretly an alien from outer space

      i doubt it

12.24.23  1:55 am   Do you ever feel disturbed by reality, not by anything in it, but existence itself?

      no

12.24.23  1:32 am   hey bill, im learning how to make candles. im not sure what scent i want to make next. any suggestions?

      chocolate chip cookie

12.24.23  1:10 am   whats your advice for people who want to be more themselves but have had to pretend to be someone else for so long

      start your own tv show about what it's like to pretend to be someone else while not liking it very much

12.24.23  12:15 am   what is your motivation to do what you do?

      it's the same as the reason plants grow, which i also can't explain

12.24.23  12:15 am   do you think it's a shame that vanity license plates are always "CHZ LOVR" or "ASSMAN" instead of calls for the proletarian revolution

      in this case, i think it's a shame that you haven't noticed the other ones out there that would make you happier

12.24.23  12:06 am   You've had an enormous impact on my life Bill. Has anyone ever complimented you in a way where you could feel how important you were to them? 

      yes it happens from time to time

12.24.23  12:02 am   do you aspire to travel the world?

     sometimes

     if so whats one place you want to visit the most

      arizona. this may be a lie because i didn't make a rankings list

12.23.23  10:18 pm   Do you like to read books?

      not really, but that doesn't mean they're not good

12.23.23  9:52 pm   my christmas tree lights are really loud 

      you should see how bright the bells are

12.23.23  9:00 pm   are you working on a big thing

      i'd rather not describe it like that

12.23.23  7:41 pm   hi bill i just want to say that i aspire to be you one day

      ok but then who's gonna be you

12.23.23  5:51 pm   What video are you most proud of

      any of the ones i'm working on now

12.23.23  5:43 pm   Do you like snow

      in moderation

12.23.23  4:45 pm   i feel like i'll be sent to prison if i don't bookend my question with a question mark or if i don't submit a question at all

      yes but it's not true

12.23.23  4:26 pm   Hey Bill. First and foremost I really appreciate you being around and answering questions people leave you. I left a question half a year ago and after a while I believe your process of making work has rubbed off on me. You're a very inspirational person to me and you believe your advice on things have given me a better outlook on my work and what I should do if I have writers block or when I begin to doubt my work. So thank you Bill.
2nd half of this question. This first semester at college I didn't do so well. I have a tendency to do my work later which ends up making me submit them late. I understand the importance of college and getting work in on time. Do you have any suggestions for habit forming so I can quit the mentality of doing work later?

      the most effective thing that can change this is for the consequences to get more serious. this however is usually not in your hands

12.23.23  3:50 pm   why are green cars so rare

      they would be too distracting

12.23.23  3:44 pm   Have you ever worked with tuning and temperment systems beside 12-tone equal temperment?

     yes

     If so, did you find anything that you liked that worked in context?

      no

12.23.23  3:21 pm   Are you dyslexic? 

      no

12.23.23  1:54 pm   Is there a chord demo for 'slow down'?

      yes

12.23.23  1:37 pm   Do you listen to your music after it's posted?

      occasionally

12.23.23  1:27 pm   what is your opinion on bread?

      iconic

12.23.23  1:04 pm   Your opinion on the monkey driving a golf cart?

      i find your use of the word 'the' interesting here, because it implies that you think there is only one

12.23.23  12:45 pm   How to launch into interstellar orbit 

      i'm not sure

12.23.23  12:21 pm   what is your favourite song

      whichever one is currently playing

12.23.23  12:12 pm   What is iconic?

      everything

12.23.23  11:58 am   what do you think?

      sometimes i think about how things feel

12.23.23  11:27 am   can you donate some of the self-confidence to me? i kind of need it

      sure. what do you think this whole website is for

12.23.23  10:20 am   hey bill wyrtz why are u like me (i kind of love it

      surely we are vaguely related, sharing a planet and such

12.23.23  9:24 am   What are your favourite countries? 

      favoring countries is so unfair, i wouldn't want to admit even if i'm doing it

12.23.23  6:24 am   what are some of the songs that you adore?

      in that case, i adore all of them

12.23.23  5:03 am   what obstacles do you need to overcome to collaborate with more people?

      none

12.23.23  5:02 am   are you a llama

      no

12.23.23  4:42 am   do you have the soap gene that makes cilantro taste like soap to you?

      not sure. i've never tasted soap

12.23.23  4:09 am   How cold is antartica

      -22F / -30C

12.23.23  3:46 am   why have your answers sounded more normal lately

      could be a reflection of you, in this case

12.23.23  2:53 am   how are you so cool?

      could be a reflection of you, in this case

12.23.23  2:32 am   Are you in cahoots?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.23.23  2:02 am   do you think making stuff is fun

      yes

12.23.23  1:55 am   What should I do to encourage my plant to grow 

      peer pressure? surround it with other growing plants

12.23.23  1:15 am   do you explore

      yes

12.23.23  1:00 am   Do I need to find myself or is it gonna find me at some point 

      it will be a collaboration between the two

12.23.23  12:46 am   about to confront my past

      good luck
